item.description:
Upon arriving at La Casona, you feel that you have been transported to Latin America. The authentic Latin American d√©cor will remind you of Peru, Colombia, Argentina and Puerto Rico. And the food, featuring authentic well-known dishes like Ceviche Mixto, with fish, shrimp, squid, scallops and escargot in a tangy lemon and cilantro sauce, and its signature paella will leave you eager to come back again and again.

The food is GREAT...the company even BETTER! Join us for dinner...with a Latin flair!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on our table

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: La Casona---Authentic Latin Cuisine!
